segments.text: Actually , I was wondering what we should do if either one of us would like to terminate the contract ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , as a rule , the contract will become void automatically , if both sides do not agree to renew it when time comes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got it , but nevertheless . what I was saying just now was that how to terminate the contract before its term's up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry . I misunderstood . Well , in that case , the contract can be canceled with a 2 month's notice . What do you say ?
segments.speaker: S2
